column2: Real gross domestic product (GDP) ^Annual adjusted for inflation^
Unemployment rate ^% of active workforce unemployed^
Employment rate ^% of total population holding a job (25 - 54 years old)^
Average weekly earnings ^Full-time workers (25 - 54 years old)^
Immigrant employment gap ^Difference in employment rate between immigrant women and Canadian-Born (25-54)^
Indigenous employment gap ^Difference in employment rate between indigenous and non-indigenous (25-54)^
Unactive youth ^Not employed, not studying or training (15-29)^
Women wage gap ^% of difference with men (adjusted by industry)^
